preferences_saved: Preferences saved successfully in device storage.
offline_message: Your device appears to be offline.
offline_retry_message: Your device appears to be offline. The request has been added to the queue for processing once the connection is restored.
file_download_success_media_access: File download completed successfully. Kindly verify its presence in your gallery or media library.
unsupported_file_type: Unfortunately, the file type is not supported for previewing. We kindly ask that you download the file instead.

failed_to_retrieve_document_status: Failed to retrieve document status. Please try again.
failed_to_update_document_status: Failed to update document status. Please try again.

workflow_status_not_allow_activity: Workflow status doesn't allow to change the document.
no_workflow_assigned: No workflow is assigned to this document type.
cache_reset_message: The data that can be modified here is stored in your device's cache and will be reset when you log out or clear the cache.
no_entry_found_selected_date: No time entry found for the selected date {{selectedDate}}.
department_or_task_required_message: Please enter either department or task.
only_one_task_or_department_allowed: You can only select either a task or a department, not both.
remark_recommended_message: The remark was not included. It is advisable to add it to the item.
timesheet_header_remark_recommended_mess: Adding a timesheet header remark is recommended.
note_timesheet_item_task: Tasks are filtered based on your selected customer and/or project. Clear selections to view all tasks assigned to you or marked for all resources, including those with incomplete progress or a finish date on or after the current timesheet period.
note_timesheet_item_project: Projects are filtered by selected customers. Clear selections to view all active projects assigned to you.
delete_item_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
item_exists: An item with the same task or department already exists on {{selectedDate}}.
upload_error_413: Payload too large. Please upload a smaller file.
filename_cannot_consist_of_extension: Filename cannot consist only of an extension.
invalid_file_extension: Invalid file extension. Supported extensions are: {{extensions}}.
please_select_timesheet_create_date: Please select the date for which you want to enter the time
info_timesheet_exists: There already exists a timesheet opening that in a few seconds...
checking_timesheet: Checking if a timesheet exists for the selected date...
info_timesheet_not_exists: No timesheet exists for the selected date. Going to find the period for the selected date and creating a timesheet for that period...
no_valid_period_in_timesheet_type: Valid period not found in the maintained period schedules for the timesheet type.
no_timesheet_type_found: No timesheet type found with the specified external ID.
period_schedule_missing: The period schedule with ID {{periodScheduleId}} is missing.
period_schedule_missing_valid_date: The period schedule with ID {{periodScheduleId}} has an incorrect valid from date setup. Please contact support or your administrator for assistance.
timesheet_creation_error: Timesheet cannot be created, start or end date missing.
error_fetching_data: An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again later.
error_hire_date: You cannot book time before your hire date ({date})
error_term_date: You cannot book time after your termination ({date})
timesheet_type_department_only: The Timesheet Type is set up to display only the department.
remark_language_note: If you change the application's language, any remarks specified in a particular language will not be visible.
add_task_before_saving: You need to add at least one task before saving.
timesheet_patterns_validation_message: Total time of {{actual}} hour(s) is less than the standard work hours of {{standard}} hour(s) on {{date}}.
timesheet_min_hours_day_validation_messa: The total hour(s) for {{date}} is {{actual}}, which is less than the minimum required {{min}} hour(s).
timesheet_max_hours_day_validation_messa: The total hour(s) for {{date}} is {{actual}}, which exceeds the maximum allowed {{max}} hour(s).
timesheet_min_hours_period_validation_me: For each {{periodName}} starting on {{periodStartDate}}, the total hours worked is {{actual}}, which is below the minimum required of {{min}}.
timesheet_max_hours_period_validation_me: For each {{periodName}} starting on {{periodStartDate}}, the total hours worked is {{actual}}, which exceeds the maximum allowed of {{max}}.
validation_error_min_increment: Enter time in increments of {{minIncr}} minutes.
validation_warning_min_increment: Please note that time should be entered in increments of {{minIncr}} minutes.
time_conversion_warning: Value is less than 1 hour. Consider using minutes as the unit.
duration_cannot_exceed_24_hours: The duration entered for a single day cannot exceed 24 hours.
time_allocated_to_department: Time is allocated to the department, so it is not billable
hours_modification_note: The hours shown include any modifications, but they are not considered final until they are saved.
billable_status_note: The billable status is determined by the task's billable setting. However, after a timesheet item is saved, any changes to the task's billable setting will not automatically update the billable status unless the task is reselected or the billable field is manually updated.
allowed_decimal_places: Allowed decimal places for unit {{unit}} is {{decimalPlaces}}
save_preferences_failed: Failed to save preferences. Please try again.
image_size_error: Image size is too large. Please select a smaller image.
must_be_admin: You must be an admin to access this section.
document_cannot_open: The document category {{documentCategory}} cannot be opened on this platform.
failed_to_fetch_employee_details: Failed to fetch employee details. The document cannot be opened. Please try again later.
